pm00_01-start.03.text: If I had been just a few seconds late, the \nelevator door would've closed on me, and \nI probably would've never met you.

en.text: If I had been just a few seconds late, the \nelevator door would've closed on me, and \nI probably would've never met you.

pm00_01-start.03.context: No Japanese source available, probably it's original content.

pm00_01-start.00.text: If the time I had to live was predetermined, \nI wonder how I would handle it.

en.text: If the time I had to live was predetermined, \nI wonder how I would handle it.

pm00_01-start.00.context: No Japanese source available, probably it's original content.

pm00_01-start.09.context: No Japanese source available, probably it's original content.

pm00_01-start.10.text: You were more mysterious and dreamy than anyone \nI had ever met before.

en.text: You were more mysterious and dreamy than anyone \nI had ever met before.

pm00_01-start.10.context: No Japanese source available, probably it's original content.

pm00_01-start.04.text: Inside the elevator that I thought no one was on...

en.text: Inside the elevator that I thought no one was on...

pm00_01-start.04.context: No Japanese source available, probably it's original content.

pm00_01-start.02.text: I got called to a job interview out of nowhere, so \nI needed to buy a suit.

en.text: I got called to a job interview out of nowhere, so \nI needed to buy a suit.

pm00_01-start.02.context: No Japanese source available, probably it's original content.

pm00_01-start.08.context: No Japanese source available, probably it's original content.

pm00_01-start.11.text: I couldn’t take my eyes off you.

en.text: I couldn’t take my eyes off you.

pm00_01-start.11.context: No Japanese source available, probably it's original content.

pm00_01-start.12.text: In that moment, I think I’d already fallen in love \nwith you, without even knowing your name.

en.text: In that moment, I think I’d already fallen in love \nwith you, without even knowing your name.

pm00_01-start.12.context: No Japanese source available, probably it's original content.

pm00_01-start.06.text: You turned around with tears in your eyes, not \nsaying a word.

en.text: You turned around with tears in your eyes, not \nsaying a word.

pm00_01-start.06.context: No Japanese source available, probably it's original content.

pm00_01-start.01.text: The shopping mall was just about to close. \nI managed to slip through the elevator door \nright as it slid shut.

en.text: The shopping mall was just about to close. \nI managed to slip through the elevator door \nright as it slid shut.

pm00_01-start.01.context: No Japanese source available, probably it's original content.

pm00_01-start.05.text: With the sparkling winter cityscape in the \nbackground...

en.text: With the sparkling winter cityscape in the \nbackground...

pm00_01-start.05.context: No Japanese source available, probably it's original content.

pm00_01-start.07.text: We noticed each other at nearly the same time.

en.text: We noticed each other at nearly the same time.

pm00_01-start.07.context: No Japanese source available, probably it's original content.

pm00_01-skiptoend.01.context: No Japanese source available, probably it's original content.

pm00_01-skiptoend.00.context: No Japanese source available, probably it's original content.
